title: The Internet Is Demanding A Bill Hader/Phoebe Waller-Bridge Romcom Tout Fkn Suite
text:
It’s gonna take a hell of an effort for anyone to overshadow Phoebe Waller-Bridge at this year’s Emmy, after the Fleabag marvel picked up writing AND acting Emmys for the series within the space of just 30 minutes at the start of the show, as well as the gong for Outstanding Comedy Series for the show. But if fans – and, honestly, us – have their way, PWB’s next gig will come in conjunction with her fellow-Emmy presenter, Bill Hader.

Hader and Waller-Bridge presented the Best Supporting Actor in a Limited Series Emmy, after they each picked up Best Actor/Actress in a Comedy awards for their work in Barry and Fleabag respectively.

But the mere sight of the pair of them standing side-by-side has sent everyone’s dang heart a-flutter, and the demands for a romcom or a buddy movie or bloody anything at all with the two of them in it have been rolling in thick and fast.

get me the buddy cop comedy this instant pic.twitter.com/CUu4PMDiwV — Alison Herman (@aherman2006) September 23, 2019

Hi, may I get a romcom with Phoebe Waller Bridge and Bill Hader please and thank you #Emmys pic.twitter.com/1KU2qMhsur — Emily A. Cummins (@emilyacummins) September 23, 2019

Okay now let Phoebe Waller-Bridge write a super witty and sneakily devastating romcom that she co-stars in with Bill Hader. — Adam Chitwood (@adamchitwood) September 23, 2019

okay i need bill hader and phoebe waller bridge to play brother and sister in a show or movie or something PLEASE #emmys pic.twitter.com/owQyTSBr35 — annie (@kerdubs) September 23, 2019

The #Emmys producers must have literally followed me deep into one of my weirder sex dreams when they decided to pair Phoebe Waller-Bridge and Bill Hader together to present an award to Ben Whishaw. pic.twitter.com/g3sdrhC85e — The Black Tea Pokémon (@yosoymichael) September 23, 2019

Ok fine remake The Philadelphia Story I SEE IT pic.twitter.com/Oxw8zCEXse — rachel syme (@rachsyme) September 23, 2019

Someone seriously cast Phoebe Waller-Bridge and Bill Hader in a romcom pic.twitter.com/w99pexkbTt — Emily Ann Scott (@Emascott92) September 23, 2019

a) holy shit give me a pwb + bill hader show immediately b) "a limited series is a tv show that was canceled" is [chefs kiss] — Kathryn VanArendonk (@kvanaren) September 23, 2019

phoebe waller-bridge and bill hader? yes ma'am. — lindsey romain (@lindseyromain) September 23, 2019

I’m up for a

Phoebe Waller-Bridge / Bill Hader season of True Detective — Roland Scahill (@rolandscahill) September 23, 2019

Let Bill Hader and Phoebe Waller-Bridge host the rest of the show. Please #Emmys2019 — elan gale (@theyearofelan) September 23, 2019

I would be happy with Bill Hader and Phoebe Waller-Bridge being the hosts, and giving every other acceptance speech. #Emmys2019 — Peter Hartlaub (@peterhartlaub) September 23, 2019

how do i tattoo this on my forehead pic.twitter.com/3YcOw67OaQ — AVERY LOVES BILL AND PHOEBE (@70sHADER) September 23, 2019

Seriously, anything at all. Book it now, Hollywood. Sign them up to the project immediately. Figure out exactly what the project is later. Just get the damned deal done.

I mean, if they can make trite awards show gags sound this good…

Phoebe Waller-Bridge and Bill hader presenting at 71st Primetime Emmy Awards for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Limited Series or Movie #Emmys pic.twitter.com/sx9tAtmsKk — AmigoZ ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) (@acgamigo) September 23, 2019

…then what the hell are we waiting for.

“A limited series is a TV show that was cancelled.”

Yes sir. Very good thanks. I’ll take ten of whatever they’re selling immediately.
description: Phoebe Waller-Bridge & Bill Hader stood side-by-side at the Emmys and now the internet wants to view no other people again forever.
